name: carne_frita_tacos
instructions: Prepare the pork by seasoning it with olive oil, garlic, and sazon goya.
Grill or pan-fry the pork tenderloin until cooked through.
For the salsa, dice the pineapple and red onion, chop the cilantro, and mix with lime juice and salt.
Serve the pork with pineapple salsa on top and garnish with pickled red onions and red cabbage if desired.
notes: This dish pairs well with warm tortillas or rice.
